title: naDe pOpa
sahitya:
naDe pOpa bhaktareDage nammayyane namma toDe biDisikomba tOya jAkSane


caraNam 1    Adiyalli nammayya mutyarugaLu pAda sEveya mADi halavu kAladali 
sAdhisidarttava sallisenna dEvane kAdanya mADOre dhanaveko koDalolle
    caraNam 2    sAlava bEDi jAla DhauLiya mADi kAlava kaLedenI laukikadinda 
mEle tiruguvudu meccOre budaru ninna kAligenna koraLige kaTTi kombene dEva
    caraNam 3    sanakAdi bhAgavatara sAkSigaLinda manake ninnadu nAma smaraNe 
anudina tappadantenage nambige koDu vanajAkSa purandara viTTalarAya
